Title: Staves for Tian Monastery
Description:
It seems like the Tian Monsatery is training a lot of monks this year. We've received a huge commission for staves. And by huge, I mean HUGE.

Could you take on part of the commission? I'd very much appreciate it. You will receive the rewards for your portion, of course.
ObjectivesText: Craft 3 Ghost Iron Staves and 2 Rain Poppy Staves. Bring them to Inkmaster Wei at the Arboretum in the Jade Forest.
